public java.lang.Object getAdapter(java.lang.Class required)
The SourceCodeEditor implementation of this AbstractTextEditor method performs gets the GDL content outline page if request is for a an outline page.

getAST

public ASTNode getAST()
This method returns the AST of the current source. Parsing of the source code is only triggered if the editor content was changed.

Returns:
KIFForm from the source code; otherwise null;

hasAST

public boolean hasAST()
This method returns whether the editor has a valid AST or not.

Returns:
True if a AST could be constructed; otherwise false.
